name: Michal Pilipczuk
content: Homepage of MichaÅ Pilipczuk Homepage of MichaÅ Pilipczuk HOME         PUBLICATIONS         THESIS         THE BOOK         SONATA       BOBR         TEACHING (PL)         LINKS Source: UW, 2020 About me I am an associate professor (pol. profesor uczelni) at the Institute of Informatics, Faculty of Mathematics, Informatics and Mechanics of the University of Warsaw. My research interests include algorithms on discrete structures (particularly, parameterized algorithms), structural graph theory, and logic in computer science. More information can be found in the detailed CV (last update: January 2025).
